children.docstring: Enforce consistent spacing for the open/close braces of array declarations.

children.name: `Universal.Arrays.MixedArrayKeyTypes` :books:

children.name: `Universal.Arrays.MixedKeyedUnkeyedArray` :books:

children.name: `Universal.Attributes.BracketSpacing` :wrench: :bar_chart: :books:

children.docstring: Disallow the use of parentheses when instantiating an attribute without passing parameters.
children.name: `Universal.Attributes.DisallowAttributeParentheses` :wrench: :bar_chart: :books:

children.docstring: Require the use of parentheses when instantiating an attribute, whether parameters are passed or not.
children.name: `Universal.Attributes.RequireAttributeParentheses` :wrench: :bar_chart: :books:

children.name: `Universal.Attributes.TrailingComma` :wrench: :bar_chart: :books:

children.name: `Universal.Classes.RequireAnonClassParentheses` :wrench: :bar_chart: :books:

children.docstring: Disallow classes being declared `final`.
children.name: `Universal.Classes.DisallowFinalClass` :wrench: :bar_chart: :books:

children.docstring: Require all non-`abstract` classes to be declared `final`.
children.name: `Universal.Classes.RequireFinalClass` :wrench: :bar_chart: :books:

children.docstring: Require a consistent modifier keyword order for class declarations.
children.name: `Universal.Classes.ModifierKeywordOrder` :wrench: :bar_chart: :books:

children.name: `Universal.CodeAnalysis.ConstructorDestructorReturn` :wrench: :books:

children.name: `Universal.CodeAnalysis.ForeachUniqueAssignment` :wrench: :books:

children.name: `Universal.CodeAnalysis.NoDoubleNegative` :wrench: :books:

children.name: `Universal.CodeAnalysis.NoEchoSprintf` :wrench: :books:

children.name: `Universal.CodeAnalysis.StaticInFinalClass` :wrench: :books:

children.name: `Universal.Constants.LowercaseClassResolutionKeyword` :wrench: :bar_chart: :books:

children.docstring: Require a consistent modifier keyword order for OO constant declarations.
children.name: `Universal.Constants.ModifierKeywordOrder` :wrench: :bar_chart: :books:

children.docstring: Enforce uppercase when using PHP native magic constants, like `__FILE__` et al.
children.name: `Universal.Constants.UppercaseMagicConstants` :wrench: :bar_chart: :books:

children.name: `Universal.ControlStructures.DisallowAlternativeSyntax` :wrench: :bar_chart: :books:

children.name: `Universal.ControlStructures.IfElseDeclaration` :wrench: :bar_chart: :books:

children.name: `Universal.Files.SeparateFunctionsFromOO` :bar_chart: :books:

children.name: `Universal.FunctionDeclarations.NoLongClosures` :bar_chart: :books:

children.name: `Universal.FunctionDeclarations.RequireFinalMethodsInTraits` :wrench: :bar_chart: :books:

children.name: `Universal.Lists.DisallowLongListSyntax` :wrench: :books:

children.docstring: Disallow the use of short lists.
children.name: `Universal.Lists.DisallowShortListSyntax` :wrench: :bar_chart: :books:

children.name: `Universal.Namespaces.DisallowCurlyBraceSyntax` :bar_chart: :books:

children.name: `Universal.Namespaces.EnforceCurlyBraceSyntax` :bar_chart: :books:

children.name: `Universal.NamingConventions.NoReservedKeywordParameterNames` :books:

children.name: `Universal.OOStructures.AlphabeticExtendsImplements` :wrench: :bar_chart: :books:

children.name: `Universal.Operators.ConcatPosition` :wrench: :bar_chart: :books:

children.docstring: Enforce the use of the boolean `&&` and `||` operators instead of the logical `and`/`or` operators.
children.name: `Universal.Operators.DisallowLogicalAndOr` :bar_chart: :books:

children.docstring: Disallow the use of short ternaries `?:`.
children.name: `Universal.Operators.DisallowShortTernary` :bar_chart: :books:

children.docstring: * Disallow the use of post-in/decrements in stand-alone statements - error codes: `PostDecrementFound` and `PostIncrementFound`. Using pre-in/decremen
children.name: `Universal.Operators.DisallowStandalonePostIncrementDecrement` :wrench: :bar_chart: :books:

children.docstring: Enforce the use of strict comparisons.
children.name: `Universal.Operators.StrictComparisons` :wrench: :bar_chart: :books:

children.docstring: Enforce spacing rules around the union, intersection and DNF type operators. * No space on either side of a union or intersection type operator. * No
children.name: `Universal.Operators.TypeSeparatorSpacing` :wrench: :bar_chart: :books:

children.docstring: Disallow the use of parentheses when calling `exit` or `die` without passing parameters.
children.name: `Universal.PHP.DisallowExitDieParentheses` :wrench: :bar_chart: :books:

children.docstring: Require the use of parentheses when calling `exit` or `die`, whether parameters are passed or not.
children.name: `Universal.PHP.RequireExitDieParentheses` :wrench: :bar_chart: :books:

children.docstring: Enforces that the "PHP" in a PHP open tag is lowercase.
children.name: `Universal.PHP.LowercasePHPTag` :wrench: :bar_chart: :books:

children.docstring: Forbids using `true`, `false` and `null` as fully qualified constants.
children.name: `Universal.PHP.NoFQNTrueFalseNull` :wrench: :books:

children.docstring: Disallow short open echo tags `<?=` containing more than one PHP statement.
children.name: `Universal.PHP.OneStatementInShortEchoTag` :wrench: :books:

children.docstring: Disallow group use statements which import a combination of namespace/OO construct, functions and/or constants in one statement.
children.name: `Universal.UseStatements.DisallowMixedGroupUse` :wrench: :bar_chart: :books:

children.docstring: Forbid using import `use` statements for classes/traits/interfaces/enums.
children.name: `Universal.UseStatements.DisallowUseClass` :bar_chart: :books:

children.docstring: Forbid using import `use` statements for constants.
children.name: `Universal.UseStatements.DisallowUseConst` :bar_chart: :books:

children.docstring: Forbid using import `use` statements for functions.
children.name: `Universal.UseStatements.DisallowUseFunction` :bar_chart: :books:

children.docstring: Enforce the use of a single space after the `use`, `function`, `const` keywords and both before and after the `as` keyword in import `use` statements.
children.name: `Universal.UseStatements.KeywordSpacing` :wrench: :bar_chart: :books:

children.name: `Universal.UseStatements.LowercaseFunctionConst` :wrench: :bar_chart: :books:

children.name: `Universal.UseStatements.NoLeadingBackslash` :wrench: :bar_chart: :books:

children.docstring: Detects useless aliases in import use statements.
children.name: `Universal.UseStatements.NoUselessAliases` :wrench: :books:

children.name: `Universal.WhiteSpace.AnonClassKeywordSpacing` :wrench: :bar_chart: :books:

children.docstring: Enforce that there is no space before a comma and exactly one space, or a new line, after a comma.
children.name: `Universal.WhiteSpace.CommaSpacing` :wrench: :bar_chart: :books:

children.docstring: Enforce using spaces for mid-line alignment.
children.name: `Universal.WhiteSpace.DisallowInlineTabs` :wrench: :books:

children.docstring: Standardize the amount of spacing around the `...` in a first class callable.
children.name: `Universal.WhiteSpace.FirstClassCallableSpacing` :wrench: :bar_chart: :books:
